text: Teresa Marta Ruiz Penella (29 July 1939 – 11 August 2017) better known as Terele Pávez was a Spanish actress. She appeared in more than ninety movies since 1954. She was born in Bilbao (Biscay), Spain. She was known for her roles in The Holy Innocents, La Celestina and in El Bar. She won a Goya Award in 2003. Pávez died on 11 August 2017 from a stroke at the age of 78.Muere Terele Pávez a los 78 años ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:Goya Award winners Category:1939 births Category:2017 deaths Category:Deaths from stroke Category:Spanish movie actors Category:Spanish television actors Category:People from Bilbao
title: Terele Pávez
